alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 9:18AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Mason, north central Kanawha, northern Putnam and southeastern Jackson Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 918 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor water issues could occur. Locations impacted include... Winfield, Eleanor, Buffalo, Kenna, Teays Valley, Bancroft, Given, Fraziers Bottom, Kentuck, Liberty and Fairplain. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 118 and 134. Interstate 64 in West Virginia near mile marker 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
